privacy.title:
Privacy
Policy
privacy.subtitle: Your privacy is important to us. Learn how we collect, use, and protect your information.

collect.title: Information We Collect
collect.description: Pushtoconverter is designed with privacy in mind. We collect only the minimum information necessary to provide our services:
collect.item1: Files you upload for conversion (temporarily, for processing only)
collect.item3: IP address and browser information (for security purposes)

use.title: How We Use Your Information
use.description: We use the information we collect only for the following purposes:
use.item1: To perform your file conversion operations
use.item3: To ensure security and prevent abuse
use.item4: To provide customer support when needed

security.title: File Security
security.description: Your uploaded files are processed with the highest level of security:
security.item1: All file transfers are encrypted using SSL/TLS
security.item2: Files are automatically deleted after conversion (within 24 hours)
security.item3: We never store your files permanently
security.item4: Files are processed in secure, isolated environments

sharing.title: Data Sharing
sharing.description: We do not sell, trade, or share your personal information with third parties. The only exceptions are:
sharing.item2: Service providers who help us operate our platform (under strict confidentiality)

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking
cookies.description: We use minimal cookies for essential functionality:

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.item1: To request information about the data we hold
rights.item2: To request deletion of your data
rights.item3: To opt-out of non-essential data collection
rights.item4: To contact us with any privacy concerns

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us:
contact.subject: Privacy Policy Inquiry

changes.title: Changes to This Policy
changes.description: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify users of significant changes by posting the new policy on this page and updating the "Last updated" date.

Terms of

terms.subtitle: Please read these terms carefully before using our file conversion services.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.description: By accessing and using Pushtoconverter, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provisions of this agreement.

service.title: Service Description
service.description: Pushtoconverter provides online file conversion services. We offer various tools for converting files between different formats, including video, audio, image, and document formats.

responsibilities.title: User Responsibilities
responsibilities.description: As a user of our service, you agree to:
responsibilities.item1: Use the service only for lawful purposes
responsibilities.item2: Not upload files containing malicious code or illegal content
responsibilities.item4: Not attempt to reverse engineer or compromise our systems
responsibilities.item5: Not use the service for commercial resale without permission

upload.title: File Upload and Processing
upload.item1: Maximum file size is 100MB per file
upload.item2: Files are automatically deleted after 24 hours
upload.item3: We do not guarantee conversion success for all file types
upload.item4: It is your responsibility to ensure you have the right to convert uploaded files

availability.title: Service Availability
availability.description: While we strive to maintain high service availability, we do not guarantee uninterrupted access. We may perform maintenance, updates, or changes that temporarily affect service availability.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.description: Pushtoconverter shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, including loss of profits, data, use, goodwill, or other intangible losses.

property.title: Intellectual Property
property.description: The service and its original content, features, and functionality are owned by Pushtoconverter and are protected by international copyright, trademark, patent, trade secret, and other intellectual property laws.

termination.title: Termination
termination.description: We may terminate or suspend your access to our service immediately, without prior notice or liability, for any reason whatsoever, including if you breach the Terms.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.description: We reserve the right to modify or replace these Terms at any time. If a revision is material, we will try to provide at least 30 days' notice prior to any new terms taking effect.

about.title: About Pushtoconverter
about.description1: Pushtoconverter is your go-to online platform for seamless and efficient file conversions. We are dedicated to providing you with a fast, secure, and user-friendly experience for all your file conversion needs. Our mission is to simplify the file conversion process and make it accessible to everyone, everywhere.
about.description2: With over 40 specialized tools, we cover a wide range of formats, from documents and images to audio and video. We continuously strive to improve our services and add new features to ensure you have the best possible conversion experience.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Do you have questions, feedback, or need support? We'd love to hear from you!

faq.title: Frequently Asked
faq.subtitle: Find answers to the most common questions about our file conversion services.
faq.q1: How do I convert files on Pushtoconverter?
faq.a1: File conversion is very simple! Select the tool you need from our homepage, upload your file, and click convert. The process is automatic and your converted file will be ready for download in seconds.
faq.a2: Yes! Pushtoconverter is completely free. We don't charge any fees, require registration, or have hidden costs. All our conversion tools are free forever.
faq.a3: Absolutely! We take your privacy seriously. All files are processed securely with SSL encryption and automatically deleted from our servers after conversion. We never store or share your personal files.
faq.q4: What file formats do you support?
faq.a4: We support over 40 different file formats, including video (MP4, AVI, MOV), audio (MP3, WAV, FLAC), images (JPG, PNG, WEBP), and documents (PDF, DOCX, XLSX). Check our tools page for the complete list.
faq.q5: Is there a file size limit?
faq.a5: Yes, we have a maximum file size limit of 100MB per file. This ensures fast processing and optimal performance for all users. We recommend compressing larger files before uploading.
faq.q6: How long are converted files available?
faq.a6: Converted files are available for download for 24 hours after conversion. After this period, they are automatically deleted from our servers to ensure security and free up storage space.
faq.q7: Can I use Pushtoconverter on mobile devices?
faq.a7: Yes! Our website is fully responsive and works perfectly on mobile phones, tablets, and desktop computers. You can convert files from any device with an internet connection.
faq.a8: If conversion fails, check that your file is in a supported format and under 100MB. If the problem persists, try refreshing the page or contact our support team for assistance.
faq.contact_subtitle: Can't find the answer you're looking for? Our support team is here to help!
